document.full_text: viadeo, the world's second-biggest online networking site for professionals behind linkedin, plans to double its users in africa within a year, its chief operating officer for the continent said on tuesday.
document.title: online network viadeo eyes africa after shelving ipo
lines_and_colors: viadeo, the world's second-biggest online networking site for professionals behind linkedin, plans to double its users in africa within a year, its chief operating officer for the continent said on tuesday.
